title: RP
body: I bought rp and i didnt get it. it charged my card and i have the email with the code but on the LoL client it says i never purchased RP??? help.

replies.body:
We had some issues with the server last night after 9:00pm PDT, along with the store being slammed with transactions due to the new content that was released. If you're still seeing no RP granted to your account, reach out to our billing specialists [in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). A billing team member will be able to investigate and resolve this issue with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
What should the request type be?

Direct link to Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


* Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**


* For the tertiary category select **RP Purchase Errors.**



http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Debonair-Ezreal.jpg
Do I wait for someone to help?
Welcomed and yup, you'll need to await a reply from a Billing & Store Support Specialist. This can take up to a few days due to increased ticket volumes.
